name: Markbot
description: An automated marking application for code projects in the Algonquin College Graphic Design program.
author: Thomas J Bradley <hey@thomasjbradley.ca>

scripts.pack: npm run clean && npm run pack:osx && npm run pack:win
scripts.pack:osx: npm run clean:osx && electron-packager ./ --overwrite --app-version=2.8.0 --build-version=2.8.0 "Markbot" --out=dist/osx --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --asar --asar-unpack-dir=vendor --version=0.36.5 --ignore='(dist/osx|dist/win|tools)' --icon=images/icon.icns --app-copyright='© Thomas J Bradley' --app-bundle-id=ca.thomasjbradley.markbot --app-category-type=public.app-category.developer-tools
scripts.pack:win: npm run clean:win && electron-packager ./ --overwrite --app-version=2.8.0 --build-version=2.8.0 "Markbot" --out=dist/win --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --version=0.36.5 --ignore='(dist/osx|dist/win|tools)' --icon=images/icon.ico --app-copyright='© Thomas J Bradley' --version-string={ProductName:'Markbot',LegalCopyright:'© Thomas J Bradley'}
scripts.build: npm run build:osx && npm run build:win
